Verses: 1 karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki:
2 neengal Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Boomiyilirukkira Sagala Mirugangalilum Neengal Pusikkaththakka Jeeva Jandhukkal Yaadhenil:
3 mirugangalil Virikulambulladhaayirundhu, Kulambugal Irandaagap Pirindhirukkiradhum Asaipodugiradhumaanavaigalaiyellaam Neengal Pusikkalaam.
4 aanaalum, Asaipodugiradhum Virikulambulladhumaanavaigalil Ottagamaanadhu Asaipodugiradhaayirundhaalum, Adharku Virikulambillaadhapadiyaal, Adhu Ungalukku Asuththamaayirukkum.
5 kuzhimusalaanadhu Asaipodugiradhaayirundhaalum, Adharku Virikulambillai; Adhu Ungalukku Asuththamaayirukkum.
6 muyalaanadhu Asaipodugiradhaayirundhum, Adharku Virikulambillai; Adhu Ungalukku Asuththamaayirukkum.
7 pandriyin Kulambu Virikulambum Irandaagap Pirindhadhumaayirundhum, Adhu Asaipodaadhu; Adhu Ungalukku Asuththamaayirukkum.
8 ivaigalin Maamsaththaip Pusikkavum, Ivaigalin Udalgalaith Thodavum Vendaam; Ivaigal Ungalukkuth Theettaayirukkakkadavadhu.
9 jalaththilirukkiravaigalil Neengal Pusikkaththakkadhu Yaadhenil; Kadalgalum Aarugalumaagiya Thanneergalile Siragum Sedhilum Ullavaigalaiyellaam Neengal Pusikkalaam.
10 aanaalum, Kadalgalum Aarugalumaagiya Thanneergalil Neendhugiradhum Vaazhgiradhumaana Praanigalil Siragum Sedhilum Illaadhavaigal Yaavum Ungalukku Aruvaruppaayiruppadhaaga.
11 avaigal Ungalukku Aruvaruppaayirukkakkadavadhu; Avaigalin Maamsaththaip Pusiyaadhirundhu, Avaigalin Udalgalai Aruvaruppeergalaaga.
12 thanneergalile Siragum Sedhilum Illaadha Yaavum Ungalukku Aruvaruppaayirukkakkadavadhu.
13 paravaigalil Neengal Pusiyaamal Aruvarukkavendiyavaigal Yaadhenil: Kazhugum, Karudanum, Kadaluraanjiyum,
14 parundhum Sagalavidha Valloorum,
15 sagalavidha Kaagangalum,
16 theekkuruviyum, Koogaiyum, Sempugamum, Sagalavidha Tegaiyum,
17 aandhaiyum, Neerkkaagamum, Kottaanum,
18 naaraiyum, Koozhakkadaavum, Kurugum,
19 kokkum, Sagalavidha Raajaaliyum, Puzhukkoththiyum, Vowvaalum Aagiya Ivaigale.
20 parakkiravaigalil Naalukaalaal Nadamaadugira Oorum Praanigal Yaavum Ungalukku Aruvaruppaayiruppadhaaga.
21 aagilum, Parakkiravaigalil Naalukaalaal Nadamaadugira Yaavilum, Neengal Pusikkaththakkadhu Yaadhenil Tharaiyile Thaththugiradharkuk Kaalgalukkumel Thodaigal Undaayirukkiravaigalile,
22 vettukkili Jaadhiyaayirukkiradhaiyum, Solaiyaam Ennum Kilijaadhiyaayirukkiradhaiyum, Arkol Ennum Kilijaadhiyaayirukkiradhaiyum, Aagaabu Ennum Kilijaadhiyaayirukkiradhaiyum Neengal Pusikkalaam.
23 parakkiravaigalil Naalukaalaal Nadamaadugira Matra Yaavum Ungalukku Aruvaruppaayiruppadhaaga.
24 avaigalaale Theettuppaduveergal; Avaigalin Udalaith Thodugiravan Evanum Saayankaalamattum Theettuppattiruppaan.
25 avaigalin Udalai Sumandhavan Evanum Than Vasthirangalaith Thoikkakkadavan; Avan Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaan.
26 virinakangalullavaigalaayirundhum, Irupilavaana Kulambillaamalum Asaipodaamalum Irukkira Mirugangal Yaavum Ungalukku Asuththamaayiruppadhaaga; Avaigalaith Thodugiravan Evanum Theettuppaduvaan.

27 naalukaalaal Nadakkira Sagala Jeevangalilum Thangal Ullankaalgalai Oondri Nadakkira Yaavum Ungalukku Asuththamaayiruppadhaaga; Avaigalin Udalaith Thodugiravan Evanum Saayankaalamattum Theettuppattiruppaan.
28 avaigalin Udalai Sumandhavan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoikkakkadavan; Avan Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaan; Ivaigal Ungalukkuth Theettaayirukkakkadavadhu.
29 tharaiyil Oorugira Praanigalil Ungalukku Asuththamaanavaigal Evaiyenil Peruchchaaliyum, Eliyum, Sagalavidhamaana Aamaiyum,
30 udumbum, Azhungum, Onaanum, Palliyum, Pachchondhiyum Aagiya Ivaigale.
31 sagala Oorum Praanigalilum Ivaigal Ungalukkuth Theettaayirukkakkadavadhu; Avaigalil Seththadhaith Thodugiravan Evanum Saayankaalamattum Theettuppattiruppaan.

32 avaigalil Seththadhu Ondru Yaadhondrinmel Vizhundhaal Adhu Theettuppattirukkum; Adhu Marappaaththiramaanaalum, Vasthiramaanaalum, Tholaanaalum, Paiyaanaalum, Velai Seygiradharketra Aayudhamaanaalum Saayankaalammattum Theettaayirukkum; Adhu Thanneeril Podappadavendum, Appozhudhu Suththamaagum.
33 avaigalil Ondru Manpaandaththukkul Vizhundhaal, Adharkul Irukkiravai Yaavum Theettuppattirukkum; Adhai Udaiththuppodavendum.
34 pusikkaththakka Pojanapadhaarththaththinmel Andhath Thanneer Pattaal, Adhu Theettaagum; Kudikkaththakka Endhappaanamum Appadippatta Paaththiraththinaal Theettuppadum.

35 avaigalin Udalil Yaadhondru Edhinmel Vizhudho, Adhuvum Theettuppadum; Aduppaanaalum Manthottiyaanaalum Thagarkkappaduvadhaaga; Avaigal Theettuppattirukkum; Aagaiyaal, Avaigal Ungalukkuth Theettaayirukkakkadavadhu.
36 aanaalum, Neerootrum Migundha Jalam Undaagiya Kinarum Suththamaayirukkum; Avaigalilulla Udalaith Thodugiravano Theettuppaduvaan.
37 mercholliyavaigalin Udalil Yaadhondru Vidhaiththaaniyaththinmel Vizhundhaal, Adhu Theettuppadaadhu.
38 andha Udalil Yaadhondru Thanneer Vaarkkappattirukkira Vidhaiyinmel Vizhundhadhaanaal, Adhu Ungalukkuth Theettaayirukkakkadavadhu.
39 ungalukku Aagaaraththukkaana Oru Mirugam Seththaal, Adhin Udalaith Thodugiravan Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaan.

40 adhin Maamsaththaip Pusiththavan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoikkakkadavan; Avan Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaan; Adhin Udalai Eduththup Ponavanum Than Vasthirangalaith Thoikkakkadavan; Avanum Saayankaalammattum Theettuppattiruppaan.
41 tharaiyil Oorugira Praanigalellaam Ungalukku Aruvaruppaayirukkakkadavadhu; Avai Pusikkappadalaagaadhu.

42 tharaiyil Oorugira Sagala Praanigalilum, Vayitrinaal Nagarugiravaigalaiyum, Naalukaalaal Nadamaadugiravaigalaiyum, Anegan Kaalgalullavaigalaiyum Pusiyaadhiruppeergalaaga; Avaigal Aruvaruppaanavaigal.
43 oorugira Endhap Praanigalilum Ungalai Aruvaruppaakkikkollaamalum, Avaigalaal Theettuppadaamalum Iruppeergalaaga; Avaigalaale Neengal Theettuppaduveergal.

44 naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar, Naan Parisuththar; Aagaiyaal, Tharaiyil Oorugira Endhap Praanigalilum Ungalaith Theettuppaduththaamal, Ungalaip Parisuththamaakkikkondu, Parisuththaraayiruppeergalaaga.
45 naan Ungal Dhevanaayirukkumpadi Ungalai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Varappannina Karththar, Naan Parisuththar; Aagaiyaal, Neengalum Parisuththaraayiruppeergalaaga.
46 suththamaanadharkum Asuththamaanadharkum, Pusikkaththakka Jandhukkalukkum Pusikkaththagaadha Jandhukkalukkum Viththiyaasampannumporuttu,
47 mirugaththukkum Paravaigalukkum, Thanneergalil Neendhugira Sagala Jeevajandhukkalukkum, Boomiyinmel Oorugira Sagala Praanigalukkum Aduththa Pramaanam Idhuve Endru Sollungal Endraar.
